summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein. It includes communication between associates at Deutsche Bank discussing the timing of the asset transfer, with references to individuals involved in the process.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is involved in the asset transfer process and communicates with Amanda Kirby regarding the timing of the transfer.

persons.context: Amanda Kirby forwards information about the asset transfer and is involved in the communication regarding the timing of the transfer.

persons.name: Harry Baller
persons.context: Harry Baller is mentioned as having suggested waiting until Monday to complete the asset transfer.

persons.name: Janet E Young
persons.context: Janet E Young is involved in the initial communication regarding the asset transfer but her specific role is not detailed.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is included in the email chain regarding the asset transfer but his specific role is not detailed.
